ai-kv9.7:1.3_0: Happy, falling into the opportunity of pleasure and happiness, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-kv9.7:2.3_0: Isn’t there any placing the mind and keeping it connected?
ai-kv9.7:2.5_0: there is a meditation subject as a foundation of immersion that’s diligent, keen, and resolute.
ai-kv9.7:3.3_0: Is there’s not placing the mind and keeping it connected?
ai-kv9.7:3.10_0: “As immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected?”
ai-kv9.7:3.12_0: Has been spoken by the Buddha:
ai-kv9.7:3.13_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-kv9.7:3.15_0: The exposition of the teaching on what is finished.
